Oct 4, 2002

Project Vote Smart – A Voter’s Self Defense System

If you look up your representatives on this web site you will get the best data I was able to find about their voting records on specific issues. You can look at their raw voting records, their response to a survey (if they chose to respond), and – best of all- a list of how different special interest groups rated them. Nothing like findin...
